name: Little Hospital - Doctor Spa Salon & Kids Games
name_original: Little Hospital - Doctor Spa Salon & Kids Games
description:
Come help the doctors take care of all of the little patients. Featuring 9 different activities to complete on your little hospital journey.

Activities:
-Patient Check Up
-Get the Doctors Ready
-Ear Doctor
-Mouth Doctor
-Nose Doctor
-Eye Doctor
-Foot Doctor
-Bone Doctor
-Dentist

*Please note that Little Hospital is free to play, but you are able to purchase game items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.*

Kids Games Studio is very concerned about our users' privacy. To understand our policies and obligations, please read our Terms Of Service and Privacy Policy carefully.

Terms Of Service: http://www.kidsgamesstudio.com/tos
Privacy Policy: http://www.kidsgamesstudio.com/privacy
